Name: separation anxiety disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves the feeling of excessive and inappropriate levels of anxiety over being separated from a person to whom the individual has a strong emotional attachment or place.

Name: obsessive-compulsive disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves unwanted and repeated thoughts

Name: generalized anxiety disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that is characterized by long-lasting anxiety that is not focused on any one object or situation.

Name: post-traumatic stress disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder which results from a traumatic experience that results in psychological trauma.

Name: neurotic disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves discress but neither delusions nor hallucinations.

Name: obsolete adrenocortical hyperplasia
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves discress but neither delusions nor hallucinations.

Name: obsolete adrenal hyperplasia
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves discress but neither delusions nor hallucinations.

Name: phobic disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder where fear and anxiety are triggered by a specific stimulus or situation.

Name: panic disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that is characterized by unexpected and repeated episodes of intense fear accompanied by physical symptoms that may include chest pain

Name: acute stress disorder
Definition: An anxiety disorder that has_symptom flashbacks
